name: Home Designer - House Blast
description:
Maybe we do not have the dream home in the bustling metropolis, but we can design the dream home in advance with our fingertips!

In Home Designer, you can complete puzzle games to earn gold coins and build dream homes from scratch. From a modest living room to a rococo palace, inspire your design talents!

·House design: arbitrary house design, a variety of styles with arbitrary collocation!

·Fun Puzzle Solving: Thousands of levels with a variety of interesting and powerful items, new obstacles to bring more fun!

·Multiple houses: dressing up only one house is too small for the players! From a modest living room to a rococo palace, inspire your design talents!

In short, the text is pale, go to explore first!
